headline: A Look At Consolidated Edison (ED) Valuation After US$775.67m Follow On Equity Offering
summary: Consolidated Edison (ED) has just raised about US$775.67m through a follow on equity offering of 7,000,000 common shares at roughly US$110.81 each, a move that directly affects shareholder dilution and funding capacity. See our latest analysis for Consolidated Edison. The follow on offering and forward sale agreement come after a period of stronger momentum, with a 30 day share price return of 5.52% and a 90 day share price return of 14.96%. The 5 year total shareholder return of 96.48%...
